msIdentifier.collection: Kungliga Vitterhets Historie och Antikvitets Akademien
msIdentifier.idno: Forn Sagor om Ketill Häng, Grim Ludenkind och Pile Odder

altIdentifier.idno: H.1. - Forn Sagor om Ketill Häng, Grim Ludenkind och Pile Odder

msItem.title: Ketils saga hængs
msItem.rubric: Forn Sagor om Kämpare Ketil Häng, Grim Ludenkind, samt Pile Odder den Wodfarne som wardt furste el. Zar i Gårdariekt el. Ryssland.
Her börjar Sagan om Ketil Häng
msItem.incipit: Hallbiörn het en man, som war kalladur Half Troll
msItem.note: The main rubric is on a piece of paper which has been pasted onto f. 1r.

msItem.title: Gríms saga loðinkinna
msItem.rubric: Grim Ludinkins Ketil Hängs samt Pile Odds Sagor i Svenska öfversatte

msItem.title: Örvar-Odds saga
msItem.rubric: Här börjar upsoknt af sagan om Orvar Odde eller Pile Odd, Grim Ludinkinns son.
Om Pile odds födelse på Berurioder.

supportDesc.foliation: On every tenth leaf in pencil, 10, 20 etc.

p.q: Hist. has been written in pencil in the inside front cover, top-left corner.

additions.p: An ex libris from the Kungliga Vitterhets Historie och Antikvitets Akadamiens Bibliotek has been pasted in the inner front cover but has been crossed out in pencil and a stamp reading: Riksant. ämb Antikv. Topogr. Arkivet has been placed beneath.
A small label has been pasted in the bottom left-hand corner of the inner front cover, upon which is written: K. Vitt. Hist. Antikv. Akad. A. T. A. Hyllnr: H. 1.
On front flyleaf 1 is the following: 1875 Dec. Till Kongl. Vitterh. Hist. och Antiqv. Akademiens Bibliothek. af JNordenfalk fr. Holms Bibl. -1847.-. And below this Biörner, E. J. in pencil.
On the reverse first front flyleaf is written in pencil: NB Rudbecks öfsätn; af den sagor

binding.p: The volume is bound in cardboard boards covered in black and white marbelled paper with brown leather corners and spine. Upon the spine the following is written in gilt: Forn Sagor om Ketil Häng, Grim Ludenkind och Pile Odder. and lower down: Öfversättning af E. J. Björner M. G. G.. This volume is kept in a box with others. The box bears the name which the saga has been given as a shelfmark (Biörner-Brahe vol. 4).

provenance.p: The Kungliga Vitterhets Historie och Antikvitets Akademien, Stockholm, is now part of the Riksantikvarieämbetet, as a special collection. No numbers are used as shelfmarks and the old shelfmarks from the Vitterheds Akademien are ignored in favour of more descriptive designations.

revisionDesc.change: Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Completed details in Stockholm with manuscript.
